name: Microsoft Outlook Trigger
semantic_context: Fetches emails from Microsoft Outlook and starts the workflow on specified polling intervals.
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft Outlook Trigger 节点。主要用于: Fetches emails from Microsoft Outlook and starts the workflow on specified polling intervals.

pollTimes.name: pollTimes
pollTimes.description: Time at which polling should occur
pollTimes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Poll Times | 作用: Time at which polling should occur | 默认值: {'item': [{'mode': 'everyMinute'}]}

event.name: event
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger On | 默认值: messageReceived

output.name: output
output.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output | 默认值: simple

fields.name: fields
fields.description: The fields to add to the output
fields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 作用: The fields to add to the output | 默认值: []

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: foldersToExclude (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
foldersToInclude (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
sender (值: None) - Sender name or email to filter by

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: attachmentsPrefix (值: None) - Prefix for name of the output fields to put the binary files data in. An index starting from 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0".
downloadAttachments (值: None) - Whether the message's attachments will be downloaded and included in the output
